content: I'm trying to update the label of a port status issue on backdrop-contrib/ops issue queue, as the issue template ask us to do, but I cannot. Have I no permissions?
@jenlampton is this a permission we should allow in that queue? ...if not, then we should update the instructions to not ask people to do what they cannot possibly do.
...in the meantime, I've fixed those labels for you @Robert Garrigos ...let me know if I missed anything.
Since the github permissions-granting-bot is still out of order, I recommend that we not ask people what they cannot possibly do :)
